mapper.sql: partner_id, vip_id, pb_tp, up_partnerId, country, province, city, area, addr, busi_name, legal_pername, legal_peridno, comp_type, comp_name, licence_no, phone, location_x, location_y, introduce,status, update_opr, update_time, review_log, review_opr, review_time,score_logis,score_serv,score_goods
mapper.insert: insert into tb_partner_basic (partner_id, vip_id, pb_tp, up_partnerId, country, province, city, area, addr, busi_name, legal_pername, legal_peridno, comp_type,comp_name, licence_no, phone, location_x, location_y, introduce, status, update_opr, update_time, review_log, review_opr, review_time, score_logis,score_serv,score_goods ) values (#{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vipId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pbTp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{upPartnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPeridno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compType,jdbcType=CHAR},#{compName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationX,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{locationY,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateOpr,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reviewLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewOpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scoreLogis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{scoreServ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{scoreGoods,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update tb_partner_basic set country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, busi_name = #{busiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_pername = #{legalPername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_peridno = #{legalPeridno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comp_type = #{compType,jdbcType=CHAR}, comp_name = #{compName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licence_no = #{licenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_x = #{locationX,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, location_y = #{locationY,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_opr = #{updateOpr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, review_log = null, review_opr = null, review_time = null where partner_id = #{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_partner_basic
vip_id = #{vipId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pb_tp = #{pbTp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_partnerId = #{upPartnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
busi_name = #{busiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_pername = #{legalPername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_peridno = #{legalPeridno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comp_type = #{compType,jdbcType=CHAR},
comp_name = #{compName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
licence_no = #{licenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location_x = #{locationX,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
location_y = #{locationY,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
update_opr = #{updateOpr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
review_log = #{reviewLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
review_opr = #{reviewOpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
review_time = #{reviewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where partner_id = #{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_partner_basic p set p.score_logis = concat(ifnull(substring_index(p.score_logis,'/',1),0)+ #{scoreLogis,jdbcType=INTEGER} , '/' , ifnull(substring_index(p.score_logis,'/',-1),0)+1), p.score_serv = concat(ifnull(substring_index(p.score_serv,'/',1),0)+ #{scoreServ,jdbcType=INTEGER} , '/' , ifnull(substring_index(p.score_serv,'/',-1),0)+1), p.score_goods = concat(ifnull(substring_index(p.score_goods,'/',1),0)+ #{scoreGoods,jdbcType=INTEGER} , '/' , ifnull(substring_index(p.score_goods,'/',-1),0)+1) where p.partner_id = #{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
